dct_title_s: New topographical map showing the railway centre of the Republic of Mexico
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; Shows cities, towns, villages, haciendas and ranchos, common roads, rivers, railroads in operation and railroads in construction or projected.
39 x 58 centimeters, on sheet 47 x 62 centimeters
dct_publisher_sm: Major & Knapp Eng. Mfg. & Lith Co (New York)
